ValidationRule.description: Dimension Priority must be set only if Condition Anchor is "Account_Product" and Account and Product Dimension are "Bottom_Up".
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND( ISPICKVAL(cgcloud__Condition_Anchor__c,"Account_Product"), ISPICKVAL(cgcloud__Account_Dimension__c,"Bottom_Up"), ISPICKVAL(cgcloud__Product_Dimension__c,"Bottom_Up"), NOT( OR( ISPICKVAL(cgcloud__Dimension_Priority__c,"Account_Product"), ISPICKVAL(cgcloud__Dimension_Priority__c,"Product_Account") ) ) ), AND( OR( NOT(ISPICKVAL(cgcloud__Condition_Anchor__c,"Account_Product")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(cgcloud__Account_Dimension__c,"Bottom_Up")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(cgcloud__Product_Dimension__c,"Bottom_Up")) ), OR( ISPICKVAL(cgcloud__Dimension_Priority__c,"Account_Product"), ISPICKVAL(cgcloud__Dimension_Priority__c,"Product_Account") ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Dimension Priority must be set only if Condition Anchor is "Account_Product" and Account and Product Dimension are "Bottom_Up".
